text.div:
This code system http://linuxforhealth.org/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/basic-resource-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
patient-tokens Patient TokensA set of anonymous patient identifiers created by hashing Personally identifiable information (PII)

name: BasicResourceTypeCodeSystem
title: Basic Resource Type Codes
description: Standard codes for the basic resource type

concept.definition: A set of anonymous patient identifiers created by hashing Personally identifiable information (PII)
